official_title: Augmented Reality as an Adjunct to Quitline Counseling for Smoking Cessation
inclusion_criteria:
* >18 years of age
* Daily smokers that have quit smoking within the past 3 months (Aim 1) or currently smoking â‰¥ 3 cigarettes per day for the past year (Aim 2)

Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Has another household member already enrolled in the study
